addr: 223 W 79th St, Fl 3rd New York, NY
title: Crystal Nails, Salon Nail Art: Fine Lines Gel Painting (Winter Holiday)
desc:
Fine Lines Gel Painting (Winter Holiday):  Course Duration: December 6th, 10am - 4pm Crystal Nails has created this workshop to enable you to learn the foundation art of creating fine lines and shapes.? This is the basis of all Crystal Nails art courses.? Learn a winter holiday spin on this class, create 3D cable-knit sweater designs, intricate snowflakes, and the popular plaid patterns.? Please bring your Crystal Nails Barbara I and 0 Short brushes, nail art dotting tool, and gel paints to the class.? Alternatively, you may purchase these items at the class. ? 
 The designs that will be taught in the class are the ones shown in the photo, and will be taught by Crystal Nails International Master Educator, Amber Kubesch.  You will learn: * Brush Preparation * Color Theory * Correct techniques to produce fine lines
